00037         union ieee754_QNAN
00038         {
00039                 const float f;
00040                 struct i
00041                 {
00042                         const unsigned int mantissa:23, exp:8, sign:1;
00043                 };
00044 
00045                 ieee754_QNAN() : f(0.0)/*, mantissa(0x7FFFFF), exp(0xFF), sign(0x0)*/ {}
00046         };

00154 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER __m128 sse_abs_ps(__m128 x)
00155 {
00156         return _mm_and_ps(glm::detail::abs4Mask, x);
00157 } 
00158 
00159 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER __m128 sse_sgn_ps(__m128 x)
00160 {
00161         __m128 Neg = _mm_set1_ps(-1.0f);
00162         __m128 Pos = _mm_set1_ps(1.0f);
00163 
00164         __m128 Cmp0 = _mm_cmplt_ps(x, zero);
00165         __m128 Cmp1 = _mm_cmpgt_ps(x, zero);
00166 
00167         __m128 And0 = _mm_and_ps(Cmp0, Neg);
00168         __m128 And1 = _mm_and_ps(Cmp1, Pos);
00169 
00170         return _mm_or_ps(And0, And1);
00171 }
00172 
00173 //floor
00174 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER __m128 sse_flr_ps(__m128 x)
00175 {
00176         __m128 rnd0 = sse_rnd_ps(x);
00177         __m128 cmp0 = _mm_cmplt_ps(x, rnd0);
00178         __m128 and0 = _mm_and_ps(cmp0, glm::detail::_ps_1);
00179         __m128 sub0 = _mm_sub_ps(rnd0, and0);
00180         return sub0;
00181 }

00186 {
00187         return __m128();
00188 }
00189 */
00190 //round
00191 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER __m128 sse_rnd_ps(__m128 x)
00192 {
00193         __m128 and0 = _mm_and_ps(glm::detail::_epi32_sign_mask, x);
00194         __m128 or0 = _mm_or_ps(and0, glm::detail::_ps_2pow23);
00195         __m128 add0 = _mm_add_ps(x, or0);
00196         __m128 sub0 = _mm_sub_ps(add0, or0);
00197         return sub0;
00198 }
00199 
00200 //roundEven
00201 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER __m128 sse_rde_ps(__m128 x)
00202 {
00203         __m128 and0 = _mm_and_ps(glm::detail::_epi32_sign_mask, x);
00204         __m128 or0 = _mm_or_ps(and0, glm::detail::_ps_2pow23);
00205         __m128 add0 = _mm_add_ps(x, or0);
00206         __m128 sub0 = _mm_sub_ps(add0, or0);
00207         return sub0;
00208 }

00210 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER __m128 sse_ceil_ps(__m128 x)
00211 {
00212         __m128 rnd0 = sse_rnd_ps(x);
00213         __m128 cmp0 = _mm_cmpgt_ps(x, rnd0);
00214         __m128 and0 = _mm_and_ps(cmp0, glm::detail::_ps_1);
00215         __m128 add0 = _mm_add_ps(rnd0, and0);
00216         return add0;
00217 }
00218 
00219 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER __m128 sse_frc_ps(__m128 x)
00220 {
00221         __m128 flr0 = sse_flr_ps(x);
00222         __m128 sub0 = _mm_sub_ps(x, flr0);
00223         return sub0;
00224 }
00225 
00226 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER __m128 sse_mod_ps(__m128 x, __m128 y)
00227 {
00228         __m128 div0 = _mm_div_ps(x, y);
00229         __m128 flr0 = sse_flr_ps(div0);
00230         __m128 mul0 = _mm_mul_ps(y, flr0);
00231         __m128 sub0 = _mm_sub_ps(x, mul0);
00232         return sub0;
00233 }

00248 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER __m128 sse_clp_ps(__m128 v, __m128 minVal, __m128 maxVal)
00249 {
00250         __m128 min0 = _mm_min_ps(v, maxVal);
00251         __m128 max0 = _mm_max_ps(min0, minVal);
00252         return max0;
00253 }
00254 
00255 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER __m128 sse_mix_ps(__m128 v1, __m128 v2, __m128 a)
00256 {
00257         __m128 sub0 = _mm_sub_ps(glm::detail::one, a);
00258         __m128 mul0 = _mm_mul_ps(v1, sub0);
00259         __m128 mul1 = _mm_mul_ps(v2, a);
00260         __m128 add0 = _mm_add_ps(mul0, mul1);
00261         return add0;
00262 }
00263 
00264 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER __m128 sse_stp_ps(__m128 edge, __m128 x)
00265 {
00266         __m128 cmp = _mm_cmple_ps(x, edge);
00267         if(_mm_movemask_ps(cmp) == 0)
00268                 return glm::detail::one;
00269         else
00270                 return glm::detail::zero;
00271 }
00272 
00273 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER __m128 sse_ssp_ps(__m128 edge0, __m128 edge1, __m128 x)
00274 {
00275         __m128 sub0 = _mm_sub_ps(x, edge0);
00276         __m128 sub1 = _mm_sub_ps(edge1, edge0);
00277         __m128 div0 = _mm_sub_ps(sub0, sub1);
00278         __m128 clp0 = sse_clp_ps(div0, glm::detail::zero, glm::detail::one);
00279         __m128 mul0 = _mm_mul_ps(glm::detail::two, clp0);
00280         __m128 sub2 = _mm_sub_ps(glm::detail::three, mul0);
00281         __m128 mul1 = _mm_mul_ps(clp0, clp0);
00282         __m128 mul2 = _mm_mul_ps(mul1, sub2);
00283         return mul2;
00284 }

00299 
00300 // SSE scalar reciprocal sqrt using rsqrt op, plus one Newton-Rhaphson iteration
00301 // By Elan Ruskin, http://assemblyrequired.crashworks.org/
00302 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER __m128 sse_sqrt_wip_ss(__m128 const & x)
00303 {
00304         __m128 recip = _mm_rsqrt_ss(x);  // "estimate" opcode
00305         const static __m128 three = {3, 3, 3, 3}; // aligned consts for fast load
00306         const static __m128 half = {0.5,0.5,0.5,0.5};
00307         __m128 halfrecip = _mm_mul_ss(half, recip);
00308         __m128 threeminus_xrr = _mm_sub_ss(three, _mm_mul_ss(x, _mm_mul_ss (recip, recip)));
00309         return _mm_mul_ss( halfrecip, threeminus_xrr);
00310 }
